Radical 001: 一

Headword List: 一

一

一時

  1. (Skt. ekasmin samaye; Pali ekaṃ samayaṃ) n. one time. On a particular occasion or one time out of many.
    Usage: 一時，佛在拘薩羅國人間遊行
    “One time, the Buddha was in Kauśala touring among the people.”
    cf. DA 29.1.
